org.apache.karaf.config.command

Class ConfigPropertyCommandSupport

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.karaf.config.command.ConfigCommandSupport
      • org.apache.karaf.config.command.ConfigPropertyCommandSupport
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Action
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    PropAppendCommand, PropDelCommand, PropGetCommand, PropListCommand, PropSetCommand

    public abstract class ConfigPropertyCommandSupport
extends ConfigCommandSupport
    Abstract class which commands that are related to property processing should extend.
Shall be called with PropGetCommand, PropDelCommand, ConfigCommandSupport, PropAppendCommand, PropSetCommand.

      • propertyAction

        protected abstract void propertyAction(TypedProperties props)
        Perform an action on the properties.
        Parameters:
        props - the dictionary where to apply the action.

      • requiresUpdate

        protected boolean requiresUpdate(java.lang.String pid)
        Check if the configuration requires to be updated. The default behavior is to update if a valid pid has been passed to the method.
        Parameters:
        pid - the PID to check.
        Returns:
        true if the configuration requires an update, false else.

      • getEditedProps

        protected TypedProperties getEditedProps()
                                  throws java.lang.Exception
        Retrieve configuration from the pid, if used or delegates to session from getting the configuration.
        Overrides:
        getEditedProps in class ConfigCommandSupport
        Returns:
        the edited dictionary.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - in case of configuration failure.
